Get in Touch

Have an idea or project? Let's collaborate and create something great.

Let's talk. I'd love to hear from you:


⤷  elenasosalerin@gmail.com

Email me to talk about your ideas and projects. Or maybe you have comments, suggestions, or critiques about anything on my site? Spotted a typo? (It happens.)
Drop me a line to let me know.

⤷  @e_sarin on Twitter

If you have a quick note or want to say hi, please tweet at me or send me a direct message (DM). My DMs are open, which means we don't have to follow each other for me to get your messages.

☞ I look forward to seeing what I can craft for you.
